categories: Category:Battles of the Five Veils Campaign

nodes.text: After the Imperial victory at the planet Farstine, a battle took place at the Outer Rim Hook Nebula in 19 BBY between the Galactic Empire and the resisting parts of the Trade Federation company. After Imperial Grand Moff Octavian Grant chased the resistance's leader, Customs Vizier Marath Vooro, down the Five Veils Route hyperlane from Farstine to the nebula, his forces managed to capture Vooro during the battle. The arrest ended the Five Veils Campaign, an Imperial campaign against Federation holdouts led by Vooro, who had refused to acknowledge a treaty that handed over the Federation's assets to the Empire.
The battle was first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, an extensive guide dedicated to the conflicts in the galaxy, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart and released in 2012.
